channel.title: Oberon Development Team
channel.description:
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/qxa2hc.jpg[/img] [hr] Some of you may have seen the Oberon development thread, which can be found here: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,532583.msg3892722.html#msg3892722]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,532583.msg3892722.html#msg3892722[/url] Unfortunately, progress halted once I got a new computer and lost all my server files. However, I've gained access to a version of the source and I would like to continue developing this project once more. The main reason I failed to keep dedication in the past is because I had no development team, which is why I made this topic. I'm looking for at least 2 more developers to help me increase the progress of Oberon. [hr] If you are interested, you might want to take a look at some of our goals: [ul][li][b]Realistic as possible[/b] - I want to try to make the game playable, but also logical as to what occurs in real RS.[/li] [li][b]Few Bugs/Glitches[/b] - It is impossible to create something that is flawless, because the opinions of others always breaks down something into an error, so I will try my best to maintain server function in an orderly fashion.[/li] [li][b]100% F2P[/b] - Of course, you will be able to purchase some virtual goods, but all the content will be accessible to all players - please understand that people that pay for a virtual good will have easier access to the content than free players will.[/li] [li][b]Experience[/b] - This is the biggest factor in any game, and this includes things such as drop rates, leveling rates, and even the economy. A player will have to put time into their characters, therefore everyone will have a reasonable, yet challenging, experience and drop rate.[/li] [li][b]Community[/b] - I want players to come back to Oberon for not only the content, but the community. A bad community is bound to deflect players' attentions.[/li] [li][b]Non-profit[/b] - After the official release, developers will not be instantly payed, but as server population and funds increase, they will. I'm not looking forward to creating this project for my own profit, but solely to get a new and friendly community up.[/li][/ul] I hope other developers agree with at least one goal I've mentioned, but this is a world of opinion, so please discuss your view on this team. [hr] Last, but definitely not least, here is the application for a spot on the team:
[b]What position would you like to take?[/b] (Server Developer, Client Developer, GFX Designer or Website Designer) [b]Why do you want this position?[/b] [b]Do you have any form of proof that you are qualified to take on this role? If so, please demonstrate it.[/b] [b]Do you have any form of communication besides this website? [/b](Skype, MSN, etc.) [b]What time zone/region are you from?[/b] [b]What schedule will you be able to provide? [/b](Day of the week, hours of that day, etc.) [b]Why are you interested in joining this team?[/b]
I'm not going to be strict about the format you put it in, but make sure you have all of the questions answered to the best of your ability. [hr] [b]Contact Details:[/b] Skype - float4life E-mail - [email]oberonrsps@yahoo.com[/email] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/fa7wcj.png[/img] [b]Head Developer:[/b] [ul][li]Tutorial[/li][/ul] [b]Server Developers:[/b] [ul][li]None[/li][/ul] [b]Client Developers:[/b] [ul][li]None[/li][/ul] [b]Other:[/b] [ul][li]None[/li][/ul] [hr]

item.title: Oberon Development Team
item.dc:creator: @chains424 chains424
item.description:
@chains424 wrote:

What position would you like to take?: Other (Admin/Moderator - In Game and Forums)

Why do you want this position?: I’m great with socializing. I’m a christian and I witness to strangers. So I’m pretty good at anything social-like. I can help your online players with any questions they ask. Also, I can help run the forums and make sure everyone follows the rules. My only rule for that is, since I’m christian, I will no respond to any profanity(cursing) or anything perverted.

Do you have any form of proof that you are qualified to take on this role? If so, please demonstrate it.: I had an unfinished project. It was somone’s released source, it also a 639. I was going to use it as a base. But I have problems with coding considering I’m a bit new at java coding. So I’m more interested in helping others with problems. I actually enjoy answering the questions of overs. Don’t ask why, cause I have no clue, lol.

Do you have any form of communication besides this website? (Skype, MSN, etc.): I have Skype. My Skype name is aaron.skinner4.

What time zone/region are you from?: Central Time Zone.

What schedule will you be able to provide? (Day of the week, hours of that day, etc.): I’m actually homeschooled, and I’m going to my GED. So you wouldn’t believe how much free time I have on my hands. There will be some days that I’m not available because I have church activities. But mostly any hour of the day, and any day of the week. Except Sunday and Wednesdays. Like I said, sometimes I have church activities but I’d let you know ahead of time.

Why are you interested in joining this team?: You don’t even know how much fun I have helping people. Lol. I’d enjoy answering their questions. I’d enjoy enforcing the rules. I’d enjoy making sure everyone has a great time and enjoyed their stay on your server.

If you have any more questions for me, just ask and I’d be more then happy to answer them.

Read full topic

item.title: Oberon Development Team
item.dc:creator: @fier12 fier12
item.description:
@fier12 wrote:

What position would you like to take-- i would like to chose GFX Designer or Website Designer!

Why do you want this position?-- im pretty good at graphics and if you havent done so i have some Great idea’s/Choices on Grapics, And im good with Website Designing!

Do you have any form of proof that you are qualified to take on this role? If so, please demonstrate it.-- i have a website, but nothing to do with any rsps --> http://jail2break.webs.com

Do you have any form of communication besides this website? (Skype, MSN, etc.)-- i have a Gmail, Facebook, Skype, Myspace, Cell Phone.

What time zone/region are you from? U.S.A --> MINNESOTA

What schedule will you be able to provide? (Day of the week, hours of that day, etc.)-- Weekdays i am free from 4:40-8:30 Weekends i am free all day, exept saturday from 4:30-6:25 because of church.

Why are you interested in joining this team? – I really think i have experience and i would like to show it off to you, and show you my abilites of what i am able to do.

Read full topic

@Kachapino wrote:

What position would you like to take? GFX
Why do you want this position? I don’t want to let my GFX work go to waste with other servers that last for a day.
Do you have any form of proof that you are qualified to take on this role? If so, please demonstrate it. I can show you on msn or skype.
Do you have any form of communication besides this website? (Skype, MSN, etc.) Nope.
What time zone/region are you from? Eastern
What schedule will you be able to provide? (Day of the week, hours of that day, etc.) I’ll try my best to get on.
Why are you interested in joining this team? I feel like this server is going to go far because of how serious you are.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Anthony24 wrote:

What position would you like to take? (Server Developer, Client Developer, GFX Designer or Website Designer) Website Developer
Why do you want this position? Because i can offer alot to Oberon, i would love to helpout as i have been the web developer/forum developer of many rsps’s, betascape and much more.
Do you have any form of proof that you are qualified to take on this role? If so, please demonstrate it. I can code html/php/and manage mysql databases.
Do you have any form of communication besides this website? (Skype, MSN, etc.) skype: joseph.pe1, msn: jiglowaypk@hotmail.com
What time zone/region are you from? Gmt +3
What schedule will you be able to provide? (Day of the week, hours of that day, etc.) school days, 1-2 hours a day, weekends 5+ hours.
Why are you interested in joining this team? Because i would like to work with decent people who take their job seriousely, working with mature people is what i want including experienced who know what their doing.

Read full topic

item.title: Oberon Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:


[hr]
Some of you may have seen the Oberon development thread, which can be found here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,532583.msg3892722.html#msg3892722
Unfortunately, progress halted once I got a new computer and lost all my server files. However, I’ve gained access to a version of the source and I would like to continue developing this project once more. The main reason I failed to keep dedication in the past is because I had no development team, which is why I made this topic. I’m looking for at least 2 more developers to help me increase the progress of Oberon.
[hr]

If you are interested, you might want to take a look at some of our goals:

[ul][li]Realistic as possible - I want to try to make the game playable, but also logical as to what occurs in real RS.[/li]
[li]Few Bugs/Glitches - It is impossible to create something that is flawless, because the opinions of others always breaks down something into an error, so I will try my best to maintain server function in an orderly fashion.[/li]
[li]100% F2P - Of course, you will be able to purchase some virtual goods, but all the content will be accessible to all players - please understand that people that pay for a virtual good will have easier access to the content than free players will.[/li]
[li]Experience - This is the biggest factor in any game, and this includes things such as drop rates, leveling rates, and even the economy. A player will have to put time into their characters, therefore everyone will have a reasonable, yet challenging, experience and drop rate.[/li]
[li]Community - I want players to come back to Oberon for not only the content, but the community. A bad community is bound to deflect players’ attentions.[/li]
[li]Non-profit - After the official release, developers will not be instantly payed, but as server population and funds increase, they will. I’m not looking forward to creating this project for my own profit, but solely to get a new and friendly community up.[/li][/ul]
I hope other developers agree with at least one goal I’ve mentioned, but this is a world of opinion, so please discuss your view on this team.

[hr]

Last, but definitely not least, here is the application for a spot on the team:

[b]What position would you like to take?[/b] (Server Developer, Client Developer, GFX Designer or Website Designer) [b]Why do you want this position?[/b] [b]Do you have any form of proof that you are qualified to take on this role? If so, please demonstrate it.[/b] [b]Do you have any form of communication besides this website? [/b](Skype, MSN, etc.) [b]What time zone/region are you from?[/b] [b]What schedule will you be able to provide? [/b](Day of the week, hours of that day, etc.) [b]Why are you interested in joining this team?[/b]

I’m not going to be strict about the format you put it in, but make sure you have all of the questions answered to the best of your ability.

[hr]

Contact Details:
Skype - float4life
E-mail - oberonrsps@yahoo.com


Head Developer:

[ul][li]Tutorial[/li][/ul]
Server Developers:

[ul][li]None[/li][/ul]
Client Developers:

[ul][li]None[/li][/ul]
Other:

[ul][li]None[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Read full topic
